---
{"dg-home":false,"dg-publish":true,"permalink":"/English/Meaning from dict/Tarantula/","dgPassFrontmatter":true}
---


_noun_

1. 1.
    
    a very large hairy spider found [chiefly](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=421dc4c8986dd1d4&rlz=1C1JZAP_enMY772MY778&sxsrf=ACQVn0-nwqwaoo33WBBtv8KpQd4fs-JuSA:1709988323789&q=chiefly&si=AKbGX_r0zqXEeLlZhGfi3fbO0QSW7Inn6RA2uG6G1c7N1PT7KNS4v_oTQOd73ySR5opRHNe0JYw1UVXYgoeWIoFUgC_URbN3AA%3D%3D&expnd=1) in tropical and [subtropical](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=421dc4c8986dd1d4&rlz=1C1JZAP_enMY772MY778&sxsrf=ACQVn0-nwqwaoo33WBBtv8KpQd4fs-JuSA:1709988323789&q=subtropical&si=AKbGX_okpkrXRdHQwZu4Fe0iRe3u7B7T0CPxy7U92nVIvKRZr8-y9qaBvwRkMWhnvKVdJfQMeSRwQliWr-0cQLgEHgVtrbEvOeYEprP3GnpB02TLSj2UFFY%3D&expnd=1) America, some kinds of which are able to catch small [lizards](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=421dc4c8986dd1d4&rlz=1C1JZAP_enMY772MY778&sxsrf=ACQVn0-nwqwaoo33WBBtv8KpQd4fs-JuSA:1709988323789&q=lizards&si=AKbGX_r0zqXEeLlZhGfi3fbO0QSWWxF-7Eg6rgm0ySTyZrB--AOm8TNvXwB183wJ3kFb9o-zj_pmZMHRh54YA7r0DdYrrbw8tQ%3D%3D&expnd=1), frogs, and birds.
    
    ![](data:image/jpeg;base64, "http://t3.gstatic.com/licensed-image?q=tbn:ANd9GcRcRdYfD2DV3PNWdFBWwaQRy7nr8t8NXyicEY-SLVh8QuoxSzp_xi7k7t7gwHBlFFLalzuVj8OiLAUsiEL-xBA")

2. 2.
    
    a large black wolf spider of southern Europe, whose bite was formerly believed to cause [tarantism](https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=421dc4c8986dd1d4&rlz=1C1JZAP_enMY772MY778&sxsrf=ACQVn0-nwqwaoo33WBBtv8KpQd4fs-JuSA:1709988323789&q=tarantism&si=AKbGX_rLPMdHnrrwkrRo4VZlSHiJ6oTcHpK_0XmX6O7kled4cmh8l_kxkdKC1f2aXX8KgQEsqaAKVgP9ObP-1ymVZrmRKUATqgi26s3L81DiCBQi7flP00Q%3D&expnd=1).
